text:
this is the list John sent me when I bugged him: Fantasy series
mistborn series - brian sanderson (not the allow of law stuff, haven't tried that)
the way of kings series - brian sanderson (amazing)
name of the wind series - patrick rothfuss
emperor's blades series - brian staveley

Fantasy one-offs
Girl with all the gifts
The graveyard book (fantastic audiobook)

I have a library of faves at home - let me get back on my list too :simple_smile: i am in a bookclub right now that just wants to read about life balance and nonfiction nonsense â€” its killing me - when its my turn to pick the book I am going to blow thier minds.
